definition: to (carry) on one's person/to (take) with one
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
USB flash drive (Tw)/see also 閃存盤|闪存盘[shan3 cun2 pan2]

sentences.english: It looks like I'm missing one of my carry-ons from the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我好像在飛機上丟失了一件隨身攜帶的行李。

sentences.english: I have a tutor with me travling aroud the world.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個隨身的家庭老師。

sentences.english: My shoulder bag is carry-on luggage.
Marvin always carried a knife, never a gun.
sentences.chinese: 馬文總是隨身攜帶一把刀，從不帶手槍。

sentences.english: And had she had it with her during the trial?
sentences.chinese: 在審判期間她就隨身帶着這張照片嗎？

sentences.english: In addition, a compact Canon G11 camera is always with me.
sentences.chinese: 此外我隨身攜帶一部佳能G11小型相機。

sentences.english: Bring security allocation such as kneecap and cuff etc usually, and wear sneakers.
sentences.chinese: 隨身帶上安全配置和護膝護腕等，並穿運動鞋。

sentences.english: Bring all the materials that you have prepared.
sentences.chinese: 隨身攜帶你準備好的所有材料。

sentences.english: NO08, Passengers are allowed one carry-on and one personal item.
sentences.chinese: 旅客可攜帶一件隨身行李和一件個人物品。

sentences.english: Bring a brown-bag lunch whenever possible.
sentences.chinese: 只要可以，就隨身攜帶一個午餐棕色袋。

sentences.english: He must carry his passport when he travels abroad.
sentences.chinese: 出國時公民須隨身攜帶護照。

sentences.english: Oh, can I keep this little suitcase as hand-luggage?
sentences.chinese: 哦，那我可以把這個小手提箱隨身攜帶嗎？

sentences.english: Please make sure that everyone takes the Seamans Book with him.
sentences.chinese: 請確保每個隨身帶海員證。

sentences.english: The handy green cord makes it easy for you to carry it along.
sentences.chinese: 它有一條方便的綠色肩帶，便於你隨身攜帶。

sentences.english: Please take out your things out of your pockets, and go through the security gate.
sentences.chinese: 請拿出你隨身攜帶的東西，通過安檢門。

sentences.english: Carry index cards, a hand-held computer or a small notebook.
sentences.chinese: 隨身帶着卡片，手提電腦或是一個小筆記本。

definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
to go out/to leave home/to go on a journey/away from home/(of a woman) to get married
easily/without trouble/while one is at it/in passing/handy
conveniently/without extra trouble/while doing it/in passing
to receive/to accept/to take in/to hold
